Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 55th overall pick, by Pontiac in 1965...
Injured on 8/13/1972 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/3/1974 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Pontiac on 4/28/1975...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/2/1983, off David Harnden (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/1/1985, off George Popovich (NJ)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 6/3/1989...
Released by Bay City on 4/7/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 5/20/1990 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Troy on 2/9/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $406,600 per year...
